name: Falstaff: la Nouvelle Interactive
description:
Discover the video game adaptation of Giuseppe Verdi's opera: Falstaff, the interactive story.

During this short story, you will follow the adventures of Mrs. Alice Ford and her best friend Meg, who have to face the unwelcome advances of Sir John Falstaff, a clumsy, boastful and cowardly man interested in their wealth. The two friends will also manage the jealousy of the quick-to-anger husband of Alice, Mr. Ford. Together, Alice and Meg will trap John Falstaff and punish him for his actions.

DETAILS
Developer: ArtFX Promo 2021
Release: February 2020
Platform: PC, Arcade
Genre: Visual Novel

Target: 15+
